net.rim.plazmic.mediaengine
Interface MediaListener

Deprecated. Use SVGEventListener instead. 

public interface MediaListener

The listener interface for all media events.

Since:
BlackBerry API 3.7.0

Field Detail

UNUSED

static final int UNUSED
Deprecated. 
Value to use for "eventParam" parameter values in the MediaListener.mediaEvent(java.lang.Object, int, int, java.lang.Object) method, when the parameter is not required.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.7.0

MEDIA_COMPLETE

static final int MEDIA_COMPLETE
Deprecated. 
Sent when all scheduled media actions have been completed.

Unless the media contains no user focusable items, this event is not guaranteed to be the last event generated by the media, because the user could start an animation with one of the focusable items.

If the media has focusable items then the user can trigger another action. If the media does not have any focusable items then it turns into a static media.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.7.0

Method Detail

mediaEvent

void mediaEvent(Object sender,
                int event,
                int eventParam,
                Object data)
Deprecated. 
Invoked to handle media events.

The particular use of the data parameter varies with the media event being handled:

Media event data usage
MediaListener.MEDIA_COMPLETE Points to media data
MediaListener.MEDIA_REQUESTED Points to a string containing a URL for the requested content
MediaListener.MEDIA_IO Points to a LoadingStatus object
MediaListener.MEDIA_REALIZED Contains the media object returned by the downloader
MediaListener.MEDIA_LOADING_FAILED Holds a URI for the media

Parameters:
sender - Object that initiated the event, usually a MediaPlayer.
event - Event code for the event.
eventParam - Additional parameter associated with some events; at present, third-party implementors should treat this parameter as for internal use only, and ignore any value passed in.
data - Additional data associated with the event.
Since:
BlackBerry API 3.7.0
